name: Wait...
description:
I’ve done the art, story, characters and programming for this game myself in Unity, using Yarn Spinner for the dialogue system, following the yarn spinner tutorial for the dialogue code.

 

Controls:

“A” to move left

“D” to move right

“Space” to interact

“Escape” For pause menu

The game is played by interacting with people and objects, and uncovering the personal story of the player character through these interactions.

 

 

Disclaimer:

The music is not mine.

Songs are:

Santa Monica Dream by Angus and Julia Stone (spotify link: https://open.spotify.com/track/47YITQYhJXw79nCor48tnq)

The Long Road by Riley Pearce (spotify link: https://open.spotify.com/track/1L4jO7mnA7ssopGVNM5TJN)

A Normal Life from The Uncharted 4 OST (spotify link: https://open.spotify.com/track/3m8FHmWMmzGKJwkMVSBgXW)

 

Also: I didn’t know how to code a “win” condition to the game, so you’ll just need to hit escape and quit when you’re finished exploring. This was an experiment for tone, characters and narrative design, and I believe it shows those things well. I learnt a lot toying with art and coding, but they’re not my strengths.
